column3:
Will not be paying for another yearly subscription. It is always something 
going wrong with this app. My messages won't come through and when they do 
my led light doesn't show me I missed a message. However, my led light 
works for everything else.

Charging for the private box is greedy. I have had this app for over 6 
years and all of a sudden they let you keep 3 messages private. Make you 
either pay for svip or delete them. Not worth giving them a penny

Extremely dishonest! Beware! Very unhappy - if there was a Better Business 
Bureau for the Google Play Store, I would be contacting it. I paid for a 
full yearly subscription, only for them to post ads for a "SuperVIP" 
subscription, image and reduce the optional I was already receiving. Fraid 
shou...Full ReviewExtremely dishonest! Beware! Very unhappy - if there was a Better Business 
Bureau for the Google Play Store, I would be contacting it. I paid for a 
full yearly subscription, only for them to post ads for a "SuperVIP" 
subscription, image and reduce the optional I was already receiving. Fraid 
should not be allowed on the Play Store.

I've had this (PRO) for years and been happy; recently I cannot download or send MMS / pics by SMS and the "send us a report" emails return "inbox is full".  This is unacceptable!  Correct this issue asap please!

I paid for a lifetime subscription. Now I'm told I have to pay ¬£4.99 a 
month. Don't buy... Don't buy. Google store won't help you and the app 
creator ignores you. Dodgy, dodgy, dodgy. Please don't waste your money.

Can't Customize like I used to. Wish u would return extra options, which 
made everyone more satisfied with your product... Not As Great As It Use To 
Be. :(

Why are you not responding emails? I have an issue and I have sent to you 
emails to your support team but I'm not getting any answer for weeks? Why 
is that? YOU WERE SUPPOSE TO ANSWER YOUR CUSTOMERS

Love this app with its many uses and nifty privacy features... One problem 
though is the dysfunctional feature that would allow playing voicemails on 
a msg... My stock sms app on my Huawei y5 can, however!

Reviewing my prior rating, I'm deeply disappointed with the support. Any 
app can get issues but once you do not get a follow up from the Helpdesk 
there is a professional bug with the management as well. The last days I'm 
not able to send texts to my clients while a basic app can well

Was a great app. But they've bugged with so many ads it's ridiculous. STAY 
AWAY.. UNINSTALL

After my phone updated I lost my paid services. I tried the VIP recovery 
and it keeps failing. I've sent multiple feedback and emails with 
screenshots proving I paid but after weeks still no reply from customer 
service and it still isn't working.

It was great at first but it has started delaying my messages. Then it asks 
if u want to send an error report when u try to send one it doesn't show 
where to send and doesn't send.

The app altogether was really great.. but once I upgraded to premium I'm

That's so unfair. Also, I'd collected so much coins and lost all due to the 
updating. Pls fix that. Would like to know why all the cool themes aren'...Full ReviewHow come I have to upgrade again after updating? I upgraded about a week 
ago and now after this update, I'm being asked to pay for an upgrade again? 
That's so unfair. Also, I'd collected so much coins and lost all due to the 
updating. Pls fix that. Would like to know why all the cool themes aren't 
available in Germany.

Dear GO SMS Support Team, Thanks for your Excellent Messaging App. It has 
been my default SMS App in all the Android Smartphones I have used so far. 
However, the option for sending SMS from both SIMs seems to be missing in 
the current device I am using (Vivo V9 Youth). Hope the Go SMS Team will 
...Full ReviewDear GO SMS Support Team, Thanks for your Excellent Messaging App. It has 
been my default SMS App in all the Android Smartphones I have used so far. 
However, the option for sending SMS from both SIMs seems to be missing in 
the current device I am using (Vivo V9 Youth). Hope the Go SMS Team will 
look up this issue and fix it through updates of the app for this device 
ASAP.

-1 star for the horrible emojis. I have been using this app for years, & I really like it. I understand that crApple has a copyright on the emojis, but this substitution is unacceptable. These emojis are the ugliest things I have seen in a long time. They look like a 3 year old drew them!

Works perfect with nexus 4 and Motorola atrix 2. Week this was a few years

Terrible. I pay the fee every 3 months not to have pop-ups and adds

Messages, phone calls you name it. I actually PAY. Fix it, or someone else 
gets my money.

This has always been my favorite SMS app, which is why I paid for VIP long 
ago. When I reinstalled on another phone, my VIP was gone and I had ads, 
which was upsetting. However, if you go into Profile and choose VIP Service 
Recovery it will restore your previous purchase to remove ads.

Have had this app for years. Paid for the lifetime vip no ads. Reinstalled 
this on my new phone and now it wants me to pay for a subscription that I 
did not have to pay for before to have no ads??? I will be uninstalling

Getting really tired of most of my themes disappearing every time you 
update and I have to constantly go and search for them again. The ads are 
so annoying popping up every second all over. This app gets worse and worse 
as time goes by. If you don't fix it I will be happy to go elsewhere.

I have been a loyal Go SMS user for years. I miss some features I remember

change in the operations and I'm never disappointed. Can someone bring back 
that feature though? Cause if it's there I can't find it.

Existing VIP users can go their profile - touch Edit Name, touch VIP

- no r...Full ReviewI've used this app as a SVIP user since day 1. Renewed subscription July 
3rd. This version contains a price increase to stop ads and remain free. 
Existing VIP users can go their profile - touch Edit Name, touch VIP 
Service Recovery. You'll remain a VIP user. No ads. I contacted developers 
- no response. Thus the 3 stars.

I have no idea why this is happening but it happens to both my phones which are on different service providers. I since downloaded a different SMS app with loads of free background themes including animated ones and it works perfectly and there are no adds so far. If this developer can fix this annoying problem and offer more free themes and less adds then I will re-install it and use it as it does have a lot of great themes.

I've been a user for a few years, and loved Go SMS from the start. I still like it, but I miss the customizations that disappeared, such as the ability to change font, and bubble colors, as well as transparency, and other stuff that let users make truly custom themes. I got over that, but now my iss...Full ReviewI've been a user for a few years, and loved Go SMS from the start. I still like it, but I miss the customizations that disappeared, such as the ability to change font, and bubble colors, as well as transparency, and other stuff that let users make truly custom themes. I got over that, but now my issue is that when I download a new theme from within the app and choose to apply it, it eventually disappears and I'm left with the default theme. The only themes that I can apply that stay loaded on the app seem to be those that are installed via Google Play. I've installed and applied a couple of themes deveral times, only to have them randomly disappear. It's frustrating!!!!
